name: Square/Wave
description:
Square/Wave is a platform/bullet hell shooter that's same as other bullet hell shooter but different.

Description

Your character, Usako, can only shoot in the direction it's facing. However, Usako is able to walk on walls. It will stick to the wall it's walking into, but so is its enemies. Jumping is the main strategy to take out enemies that are perpendicular to you.

Harness the power of walking on walls, and try to score as high as you can!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Key to move. W or Up makes you jump. Space to fire bullets. When you run into a wall, you will stick to the wall and use the wall as the new platform.

Credits:

Game created using Construct 2. I know Construct 3 is out but I kinda don't like the way Construct 3 works.
